meanings.definition: A person who has an unselfish concern for the welfare of others.
meanings.sent1: The kind altruist helped his neighbor carry groceries.
meanings.sent2: She is known in the neighborhood as a true altruist.
meanings.sent3: The altruist happily volunteered to walk all the dogs in the shelter.
meanings.sent4: Being an altruist is like being a beacon of light in a dark world.
meanings.sent5: The altruist's heart was as big as the ocean, always ready to help others.

meanings.definition: Showing a disinterested and selfless concern for the well-being of others.
meanings.sent1: Her altruist nature made her a beloved member of the community.
meanings.sent2: The altruist act of the firefighter saved the family from the burning house.
meanings.sent3: It was an altruist gesture to donate all her birthday money to charity.
meanings.sent4: The altruist spirit in the room was palpable, everyone working together for a common goal.
meanings.sent5: His altruist behavior shone brightly, inspiring others to be kind.
